DOC.brief_summary: Assess effect daily treatment vardenafil 20mg sildenafil 100mg placebo sperm function
DOC.brief_title: Assess Effect Daily Treatment Vardenafil 20mg Sildenafil 100mg Placebo Sperm Function
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject men ED age 25 64 Baseline sperm conc . > 20 mio / ml Normal World Health Organization A+B+C sperm mortality > 50 % Normal sperm morphology ( WHO , 1992 manual criterion ) > 30 % 1.0 mL ejaculate volume 3 analysis screen phase . Presence psychological physiological abnormality opinion Investigator would significantly impair sexual performance ability provide semen sample accord protocol Spinal cord injury History surgical prostatectomy Other exclusion criterion apply accord US Product Information
